data.title: Traditional New Orleans Jazz Since 1961
data.meta_description: Preservation Hall is a historic music venue in the French Quarter working to protect, preserve and perpetuate the spirit of traditional New Orleans jazz.
data.text:
While Preservation Hall undergoes necessary renovations this summer, nightly performances will be moving to the historic Toulouse Theatre beginning June 13th. Tickets available now!

Preservation Hall Foundation's mission is to protect, preserve and perpetuate New Orleans music through education and ongoing support of elder members of our musical community.

One day while honeymooning in the French Quarter of New Orleans, Allan and Sandra Jaffe followed some musician friends to "Mr. Larry's Gallery" at 726 St. Peter Street
